artist: Artist: Auguste Louis Lepère; Editor: A. Desmoulins
description: dock with figures walking and people leaning on railing at right; other figures seated and reclining below dock on shore in LLQ; small boat on water at center; building on top of hill at top center background
portfolio: From Le Long de la Seine et des Boulevards
provenance: [Judith L. Pillsbury, Paris, until 1998; set of 20 plates with frontispiece sold in May for AOOO to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1998-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in black ink: [A Lepère]; center right in the plate, in black: [A. LEPERE (illegible)]
title: The Montagne Sainte-Geneviève, rue de l'Estacade, from "Along the Seine and the Boulevards"
